description: Shows "The Dongola Campaign", where Kitchener commanded the Anglo-Egyptian forces at the battles of "Firket" and "Hafir" against the Dervishes of the Mahdi movement in Sudan before going on to Dongola. The forces entered Dongola in September 1896. Gift; A.P. Loper; Dec. 13, 1940. Map is published in the New York Herald, Sept. 21, 1896. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image.

medium: 1 map : mounted on cloth ; 24 x 18 cm.
notes: Shows "The Dongola Campaign", where Kitchener commanded the Anglo-Egyptian forces at the battles of "Firket" and "Hafir" against the Dervishes of the Mahdi movement in Sudan before going on to Dongola. The forces entered Dongola in September 1896.
Map is published in the New York Herald, Sept. 21, 1896.
Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image.
repository: Library of Congress Geography and Map Division Washington, D.C. 20540-4650 USA dcu
